meanings.definition: To clean or dry with a shammy cloth.
meanings.sent1: She shammied the car to make it sparkle.
meanings.sent2: I always shammied my glasses with a soft cloth.
meanings.sent3: He shammied the table so well, it looked brand new!
meanings.sent4: The sun shammied the raindrops off the leaves.
meanings.sent5: After she shammied the windows, they were crystal clear.
